author: William Feuer
title: Worldwide coronavirus cases top 500,000, doubling in just over a week
description: The virus has infected an additional 100,000 people around the world since Tuesday.
content:
COVID-19 cases surpassed 500,000 across the world on Thursday, doubling in just over a week.
The total number of global cases now stands at 510,108 as of 1:30 p.m. ET on Thursday, according to data compiled by Johns Hopkins University. The virus emerged in W… [+741 chars]
